title: 1420 Rowena Street- Charming home in great location!
posting_body: ['Text', 'show contact info', 'to setup a showing!', 'Virtual tour:  1420 Rowena Street', 'AREA: THORNTON', 'FEATURES:', 'Charming brick ranch-style home with plenty of parking, open floorplan, large backyard and each access to I25 & US 36.', 'This home is cable ready and in a great location!', 'TENANT PAID UTILITIES:', 'All utilities paid by tenant.', 'BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 3 bedrooms and 1 full bath, 1 3/4 bath, all on main level', 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, garbage disposal', 'LAUNDRY: Washer and Dryer included!', 'FLOORING: Carpet and plank laminate flooring', 'HEAT/COOLING: Central heat, no AC, ceiling fans', 'PARKING:', 'One Car Garage, driveway, street parking', 'FENCING: Completely fenced back yard', 'BASEMENT:', 'None (crawlspace)', 'RESTRICTIONS:', 'Pets considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.', ' Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:', "Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.", 'APPLICATION FEE: $30 per adult.', 'Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.', 'AVAILABILITY DATE:', 'Now!', "**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 2 weeks of the property's listed availability date.", '**', 'LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12-month extensions possible at that time.', 'Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.', 'Minimum 700 credit score required.', 'PMV/SI']
